name: DC Super Hero Girls: Teen Power
overview: Join the fight as Wonder Woman, Supergirl and Batgirl from the DC Super Hero Girls animated series and save Metropolis from the horror created by Toyman! With the city in danger, even “enemies” like Harley Quinn, Catwoman and Star Sapphire will need to band together to help protect the city. Each superhero and supervillain has a unique set of abilities: for example, Wonder Woman uses her warrior skills with the Lasso of Truth and Flying Shield while Harley Quinn wields the Pop Roulette pistol that fires cheeky effects to do good and harm to Same time.
